data.eml:eml: New taxonomic and distributional information on hermit crabs (Crustacea: Anomura: Paguroidea) from the Gulf of Mexico, Caribbean Sea, and Atlantic coast of South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lemaitre, Rafael, Tavares, Marcos (2015): New taxonomic and distributional information on hermit crabs (Crustacea: Anomura: Paguroidea) from the Gulf of Mexico, Caribbean Sea, and Atlantic coast of South America. Zootaxa 3994 (4): 451-506, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3994.4.1
